channel.title: Cloud, DevOps, Databases and AI with Michael
channel.description: Recent content on Cloud, DevOps, Databases and AI with Michael

item.title: AWS Updates
item.description: AWS updates week of 12/15/2020 Amazon location service was launched, and I have a feeling not much adoption will happen. Google Maps is way ahead in terms of features and adoption. Written By Michael Agarwal

item.title: AI Updates
item.description: 19th June 2024 Claude 3.5 Sonnet was released. If you compare it with other LLM models, it does fairly well: (Reference: https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-3-5-sonnet) 13th May 2024 Check out new GPT-4o model, lot cheaper and better compared to some of previous GPT models Written By Michael Agarwal

item.title: Technical Debt
item.description: Last updated: 2024-06-19 ‚ùì What is this technical debt, and why is it considered technical debt? Technical debt arises when an organization continues to use outdated or unsupported software. This software, no longer receiving updates or support from software product companies, becomes a liability. The primary issue with such software is security, without regular updates, systems become vulnerable to new cyber threats. Additionally, outdated software often struggles with compatibility, failing to integrate smoothly with newer technologies or systems.

item.title: Parenting
item.description: Last updated: 16th June 2024 Being a parent for 19+ years, I learned a thing or two. Being new parent (0-3 year old kids) First and foremost there is no perfect parent. All you can do in try your best. Trying too hard or setting your own parenting expectations too high can lead to unnecessary frustration. Don’t compare your kids to others, each kid is different and unique, they will develop on their own pace.

item.title: Rich Content Via Hugo
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. YouTube privacy enhanced shortcode The youtube shortcode embeds a responsive video player for YouTube videos. Only the ID of the video is required, e.g.: YouTube URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qHkcs3kG44 Shortcode: {{< youtube 3qHkcs3kG44 >}} Rendered output: Headings To create a heading, add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase.
